function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreasing efficiency of UV-C system due to lamp degradation, air temperature, dust pollution, and reflective surface degradation.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in eliminating or lowering the risk of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance, cleaning, and replacement of UV-C lamps. Control of air temperature and dust pollution. Monitoring and maintenance of reflective surfaces in ventilation ducts.","Technologies":"UV-C lamp monitoring systems, air quality monitoring sensors, reflective surface maintenance technology.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, especially in areas with high risk of contagious diseases.","Owner":"Building maintenance staff, HVAC system operators, public health authorities."}]}
